1.content:
Ok! I'm going to start the beginning of this interactive by starting with the most well known Custom Robo game
Custom Robo Battle Revolution A.K.A Custom Robo as its known here in the states. This was the first international Custom Robo game ever so most people will think of this when seeing its name.

This game has ALOT of female characters so prepare for one hell of a list!... Or would you rather do another game from the series?

111.content:
phew, Marcia sighed from another slow day at work with the Steel Hearts, ever since the defeat of Rahu and the World Day Remembrance Tournament had ended a few weeks ago, crime had slowed downed significantly since then now that robos were cheaper and the general public could more easily defend themselves. Sure every now and then some petty criminal would try to steal from the lab or some trouble was started at the park but for Marcia, Harry, and Hero, for most of the days they pretty much spent their time sitting around waiting for a call, having chats, and watching the television.

To relieve herself of this boredom Marcia had taken up a bit of an eating habit and it done an amount of change to her slim physique, looking at her weight on a scale and herself in a mirror she realized she had gained...

11122.content:
After one month of laziness Marcia had drastically increased the amount of fat in her body. Now weighing in at 190lbs her ass jiggled quite alot with each step, her breasts were much larger and her belly hung slightly out of her dress now. While watching tv on the couch while eating a bowl of ice cream, Sergei came in concerned with his younger sister's new eating habit and what it had done to her figure.

"Hey Marcia" said Sergei. "Yes Sergei" Marcia replied. "Have you noticed your recent umm... pausing slightly as to not accidentally say something rude to his sister, change to your body ?" "Why yes I have brother" she said.
Aren't you concerned about what people will think?" Sergei stated "Well you've told me before you wanted me to stand up for myself and get out of your shadow, so no I'm not concerned." "Alright Marcia" Sergei sighed "Just don't take this too far, I don't want you to get hurt because of this." Heehee Marcia giggled making her belly jiggle slightly, "Thanks for your concern Sergei, and don't worry I'll handle this responsibly."

Turning back Sergei decided to go back to his own duties and leave Marcia be while she went back to the show eating to her heart's content. The next morning Marcia decided to...

1113.content:
"Oh my god!" Marcia cried, reading the number on the scale at 160, she was very noticeably bigger than her once petite from. "I can't believe I've gained so much in only a few weeks!" Poking her now round belly Marcia saw that it jiggled at the touch of her finger.

Looking at her breasts she noticed that they had gone up by about 1 cup and did a small bounce when she took a step. Turning her head she saw that her ass was much less defined with the new amount of fat in her cheeks.

"This won't help me at work if it gets in my way in custom robo battles and also... pausing for moment as she started to blush, how am I going to Hero's attention like this?"

info.brief_description: This is a female weight gain story of the series Custom Robo.
info.description:
Ok, this the first interactive story that I know of about Custom Robo about weight gain. I'm making this story for two reasons
1.I've always wanted to see a story of this
2. No one has done this before of this particular series.
With that here are the rules

1. Only female weight gain, obviously. -_-
2. These stories must take place after the main stories in any of the games, nothing in between or before.
3.As a humorous effect if one of the girls you choose has a robo that robo can also gain weight as a side effect even if the robo does not have any distinct female characteristics.
4.Sex and yuri is allowed, however please try to keep it within the story and not random.
5. No scat, I do not enjoy reading an expansion story only to find the character releasing their bodily wastes.

Other than that have fun and enjoy yourselves!
